resources.string: Login or password does not meet requirements
User not found in data base
Password does not match with user login

Login requirements:
 · At least 5 and at most 12 characters
 · Forbidden signs $=_'-+,>{}()
 · No ".." string allowed
 · Can not starts and end with "." sign

Password requirements:
 · At least 8 and at most 15 characters
 · At least one upper case letter
 · At least one of special sign
 !"#$%'()*+,-./:;=>?@[\]^_`{|}~
